mapper.sql: SELECT id 'id', name, nick_name 'nickName', post_code 'postCode', county, address, phone_number 'phoneNumber', email, remark, ems_no 'emsNo', goods_json 'goodsJson' FROM `order`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( name, nick_name, post_code, county, address, phone_number, email, remark, ems_no, goods_json ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{nickName}, #{postCode}, #{county}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{remark}, #{emsNo}, #{goodsJson} )
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET name = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, post_code = #{postCode}, county = #{county}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, remark = #{remark}, ems_no = #{emsNo}, goods_json = #{goodsJson} WHERE id = #{id}
